attributes.action: let children at local authority nursery be given a reception place automatically
attributes.additional_details: my daughter has just started full time school. Thee school that the local authority has allocated her isn't the school in which she started at nursery. I feel that if a child attends a school for nursery then when the time comes to apply for fulltime education the child should be allowed automatic placement to the school where they attended nursery. Its bad that the LA expect a child to start all over again in a school where they know no one.
attributes.background: I feel that if a child attends a school for nursery then when the time comes to apply for full time the child should be allowed automatic placement to the school.
